name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dota 2 Mirana Live Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into the mystical world of Dota 2 with Mirana live wallpaper, featuring a clock and Google search bar for your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the elegance and strength of Mirana, the Princess of the Moon, to your Chrome new tab with this Dota 2 Mirana Live Wallpaper. In stunning 4K detail, this wallpaper captures Mirana's celestial power and determination, making it perfect for fans of Dota 2. The minimalist design blends seamlessly with the dynamic visuals, offering a practical clock and a Google search bar for easy access. Whether you admire her commanding presence or her role in the battle for Radiant and Dire, this live wallpaper will immerse you in Mirana's enchanting world every time you open a tab.

Extension Features
4K Live Wallpaper:
High-resolution visuals showcasing Mirana's celestial elegance.

Minimalist Design:
A clean and stylish interface to complement the dynamic wallpaper.

Integrated Clock:
Stay on schedule with a sleek, built-in clock on your new tab.

Google Search Bar:
Quick and seamless access to Google search functionality.

Dynamic and Magical:
Mirana’s mystical aura brings a touch of fantasy and adventure to your browser.

Optimized Performance:
Lightweight and efficient for smooth browsing without interruptions.

Perfect for Dota 2 Fans:
Celebrate the power and grace of one of Dota 2’s iconic heroes every time you browse.
